name: echo-bot
description: This project consists of a node backend and an angular front end echo bot.An example EchoBot is set up here: https://chatbox.staging.chatlayer.ai/5ef5aabd99110809d2374df3?language=en

scripts.prepare-all: npm run prepare-client & npm run prepare-server
scripts.start-all: npm run start-client & npm run start-server
